app.util

Class EditorHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.util.EditorHelper

  • public class EditorHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for setting up and managing the behavior of a code editor area.

    It includes methods for configuring font settings, handling edit actions and syntax highlighting.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EditorHelper()

      Computes and returns the highlighting styles for the code in the editor area.
      static void decreaseEditorFontSize(javafx.scene.text.TextFlow resultTextFlow, org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea codeArea)
      Decreases the font size of the code editor by the step defined in the FontConfig class and updates the font size in the configuration.
      static void handleEditAction(org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea codeArea, java.util.function.Consumer<org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea> action)
      Executes an editing action on the code area.
      static void increaseEditorFontSize(javafx.scene.text.TextFlow resultTextFlow, org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea codeArea)
      Increases the font size of the code editor by the step defined in the FontConfig class and updates the font size in the configuration.

      Initializes the color mappings for SQL keywords used in syntax highlighting.
      static void setupEditorArea(org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea editorArea)
      Sets up the code editor area, adding line numbers and configuring behavior for key events to trigger syntax highlighting.
      static void setupEditorFont(org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea editorArea)
      Sets up the font for the code editor area based on the current font configuration.

      • setupEditorArea

        public static void setupEditorArea(org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea editorArea)
        Sets up the code editor area, adding line numbers and configuring behavior for key events to trigger syntax highlighting.
        Parameters:
        editorArea - the CodeArea component representing the code editor

      • computeHighlighting

        public static org.fxmisc.richtext.model.StyleSpans<java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>> computeHighlighting(org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea editorArea)
        Computes and returns the highlighting styles for the code in the editor area.
        Parameters:
        editorArea - The CodeArea representing the code editor.
        Returns:
        A StyleSpans object containing the styles for syntax highlighting.

      • initKeywordColors

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> initKeywordColors()
        Initializes the color mappings for SQL keywords used in syntax highlighting.
        Returns:
        A map of SQL keywords to their associated colors.

      • handleEditAction

        public static void handleEditAction(org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea codeArea,
                                    java.util.function.Consumer<org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea> action)
        Executes an editing action on the code area.
        Parameters:
        codeArea - The CodeArea where the action will be performed.
        action - The Consumer representing the editing action (e.g., undo, redo).

      • increaseEditorFontSize

        public static void increaseEditorFontSize(javafx.scene.text.TextFlow resultTextFlow,
                                          org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea codeArea)
        Increases the font size of the code editor by the step defined in the FontConfig class and updates the font size in the configuration.
        Parameters:
        resultTextFlow - The TextFlow component for displaying console messages.
        codeArea - The CodeArea (code editor) whose font size will be increased.

      • decreaseEditorFontSize

        public static void decreaseEditorFontSize(javafx.scene.text.TextFlow resultTextFlow,
                                          org.fxmisc.richtext.CodeArea codeArea)
        Decreases the font size of the code editor by the step defined in the FontConfig class and updates the font size in the configuration.
        Parameters:
        resultTextFlow - The TextFlow component for displaying console messages.
        codeArea - The CodeArea (code editor) whose font size will be increased.
